lat-pulldown.name: Lat Pulldown
instructions: Sit at a lat pulldown machine with your thighs secured
Grasp the bar with a wide grip
Pull the bar down to your upper chest
Slowly return to the starting position

bent-over-row.name: Bent Over Row
instructions: Bend at your hips keeping your back straight
Let weights hang at arms length
Pull weights to your lower chest
Lower weights back to starting position
